creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: box with two removable drawers and top with two pairs of hinges containing a mirror; inlaid mother-of-pearl designs; two cranes on top with branches with fruit; front of drawers have hexagonal pattern with starbursts; right decorated with deer in a landscape with trees; left decorated with cranes in a landscape with trees; plants on back; lock and key included
title: Cosmetics box with cranes and deer
